TypeSignature.Value: .class public auto ansi sealed DisableReasonType extends System.Enum

summary.span: Indica que o motivo pelo qual a extensão está sendo desabilitado.

span.span: Indicates the reason the extension is being disabled.

summary.span: O enumeração é aplicável a clientes que visam o Exchange Online e versões do Exchange, começando com o Exchange Server 2013.

span.span: The enumeration is applicable for clients that target Exchange Online and versions of Exchange starting with Exchange Server 2013.

MemberSignature.Value: .field public static literal valuetype Microsoft.Exchange.WebServices.Data.DisableReasonType MobileClientPerformance = int32(3)

summary.span: Disabled do Mobile Outlook Web App por motivos de desempenho.

span.span: Disabled from Mobile Outlook Web App for performance reasons.
